resources.string: One of the first and biggest malls in New Delhi
It is a huge temple worshipping Lord Swami Narayan
India Gate is located here. A monument for the heroes that fought for the independence of India
It is a nice restaurant at the DLF Mall
It is a good restaurant that serves Punjabi Cuisine at the GIP Mall
It is one oof the best food chain restaurants in Delhi and serves many items. The food quality and the options are pretty good here
Located in Old delhi, this place provides fashion options ranging from traditional to western modern
A very good shoppin place for clothes which are cheap yet appealing
Loacted in Chandni Chowk, this place offers probably the best paranthas of various varities in the world!
Sweet, spicy, watery and yest crispy delicious shacks popular in India
It is a blend of spicy potato mixture covered with crispy layer. One of the most delicious snacks. It tastes best with Indian Tea
